resources.string: Welcome to the game! Choice your destiny.
Enter your name with at least 3 symbols

Every time you try to catch new fish there is 30% chance to get x2 score. There is 10% chance to lose 50% of the score if you have bad luck. If you drop fish there is chance to earn new attepm to catch a fish. The game finish when your attemps are zero
*** MENU *** 1. Enter number [1] Start a new game. 2. Enter number [2] Check the game rules. 3. Enter number [3] View game records. 4. Enter number [4] Exit.
*** Choice you next step *** 1. Enter number [1] Try to get a new fish. 2. Enter number [2] Drop one fish. 3. Enter number [3] Check pond status. 4. Enter number [4] Go to main menu.
